Nahum Silent Voices Tanakh

Chapters

  • Nahum 1
  • Nahum 2
  • Nahum 3
1 The burden of Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite. 2 The Domina is a jealous and avenging God, the Domina avengeth and is full of wrath; the Domina taketh vengeance on Her adversaries, and She reserveth wrath for Her enemies. 3 The Domina is long-suffering, and great in power, and will by no means clear the guilty; the Domina, in the whirlwind and in the storm is Her way, and the clouds are the dust of Her feet. 4 She rebuketh the sea, and maketh it dry, and drieth up all the rivers; Bashan languisheth, and Carmel, and the flower of Lebanon languisheth. 5 The mountains quake at Her, and the hills melt; and the earth is upheaved at Her presence, yea, the world, and all that dwell therein. 6 Who can stand before Her indignation? And who can abide in the fierceness of Her anger? Her fury is poured out like fire, and the rocks are broken asunder before Her. 7 The Domina is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; and She knoweth them that take refuge in Her.
8 But with an overrunning flood She will make a full end of the place thereof, and darkness shall pursue Her enemies. 9 What do ye devise against the Domina? She will make a full end; trouble shall not rise up the second time. 10 For though they be like tangled thorns, and be drunken according to their drink, they shall be devoured as stubble fully dry. 11 Out of thee came she forth, that deviseth evil against the Domina, that counselleth wickedness.   12 Thus saith the Domina: Though they be in full strength, and likewise many, even so shall they be cut down, and she shall pass away; and though I have afflicted thee, I will afflict thee no more. 13 And now will I break her yoke from off thee, and will burst thy bonds in sunder. 14 And the Domina hath given commandment concerning thee, that no more of thy name be sown; out of the house of thy god will I cut off the graven image and the molten image; I will make thy grave; for thou art become worthless.
